snippet: LEAD: Before there was People Express there was Pacific Southwest Airlines, the freewheeling commuter carrier whose inexpensive flights, casual service and trademarked smiling jetliners made it as much a part of the California scene as beaches, bl...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Before there was People Express there was Pacific Southwest Airlines, the freewheeling commuter carrier whose inexpensive flights, casual service and trademarked smiling jetliners made it as much a part of the California scene as beaches, blonds and hot tubs.

headline.main: Merger Brings a California Sunset For the Most Friendly Skies of All

byline.original: By LAWRENCE M. FISHER, Special to the New York Times
